Ok this is a competition to see who the best joker is.....
The Judges are Halo1231 ..... ..... ..... ..... ..... Still need more judges.... Person with the best joke gets to be judge...... This is supposed to be fun........

item.title: Joke competition
item.dc:creator: @halo1231 halo1231
item.description:
@halo1231 wrote:

I gots one…
There are three men in heaven telling the story to god about how they died…
The first guy said: "I was coming home from the store when i saw a thief on my balcony hanging off of it. I ran to him and slamed my fists on his hands. He didnt budge. So i took a hammer and slammed it on his fingers. He finnaly let go and landed in a bush. Then i grabbed my refrigerator and dropped it on him. The refrigerator hit the bush and exploded. I felt so sad that he died that I got a heartattack and died.

The second guy said: "I was dangling off a guys balcony when this mad man came at me and slammed my fingers with his fists. But I wouldnt let go. He then took a hammer and banged it on my hand so I let go. I fell in a bush and the guy dropped a refrigerator on me and it blew up and i died.

The third guy said: “I was in a refrigerator!”

Lol i thought it was funny the first time i heard it. I hope you do![br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2007, 04:03:56 PM[/size][hr][quote=“N00b1, post:13, topic:70574”]here’s one
an Irish man Scottish man and welsh man were all in a plain they were to heavy after there engine broke down so they threw one thing out each the Irish man threw out his apple the Scottish man threw out a teddy bare and the welsh man threw out a grenade they crash landed in a park and walked in to town they seen a girl crying they asked here what’s up she said i just got hit in the head with a apple they just looked blank and quickly walked off they soon came to a lady and asked here why she was so happy she said that she asked got if she was going to have a child and then a teddy bare fell out of there sky they moved on after a few mins they saw a little boy giggling they asked him what’s was the matter he said that he farted and that building over there blew up[/quote]

Wow i heard that a million times. And its still not funny.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2007, 04:05:51 PM[/size][hr]Plz post more funny jokes!!!

Read full topic

here’s one
an Irish man Scottish man and welsh man were all in a plain they were to heavy after there engine broke down so they threw one thing out each the Irish man threw out his apple the Scottish man threw out a teddy bare and the welsh man threw out a grenade they crash landed in a park and walked in to town they seen a girl crying they asked here what’s up she said i just got hit in the head with a apple they just looked blank and quickly walked off they soon came to a lady and asked here why she was so happy she said that she asked got if she was going to have a child and then a teddy bare fell out of there sky they moved on after a few mins they saw a little boy giggling they asked him what’s was the matter he said that he farted and that building over there blew up

item.title: Joke competition
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Hope you like this

Temperatures
+15°C / 59°F

This is as warm as it gets in Norway, so we’ll start here.
People in Spain wear winter-coats and gloves.
The Norwegians are out in the sun, getting a tan.

+10°C / 50°F

The French are trying in vain to start their central heating.
The Norwegians plant flowers in their gardens.

+5°C / 41°F

Italian cars won’t start.
The Norwegians are cruising in cabriolets.

0°C / 32°F

Distilled water freezes.
The water in Oslo Fjord gets a little thicker.

-5°C / 23°F

People in California almost freeze to death.
The Norwegians have their final barbeque before winter.

-10°C / 14°F

The Brits start the heat in their houses.
The Norwegians start using long sleeves.

-20°C / -4°F

The Aussies flee from Mallorca.
The Norwegians end their Midsummer celebrations.
Autumn is here.

-30°C / -22°F

People in Greece die from the cold and disappear from the face of the earth.
The Norwegians start drying their laundry indoors.

-40°C / -40°F

Paris start cracking in the cold.
The Norwegians stand in line at the hotdog stands.

-50°C / -58°F

Polar bears start evacuating the North Pole.
The Norwegian army postpones their winter survival training awaiting real winter weather.

-70°C / -94°F

The false Santa moves south.
The Norwegian army goes out on winter survival training.

-183°C / -297.4°F

Microbes in food don’t survive.
The Norwegian cows complain that the farmers’ hands are cold.

-273°C / -459.4°F

ALL atom-based movent halts.
The Norwegians start saying “Faen, det er kalt ute idag.”

-300°C / -508°F

Hell freezes over.
Norway wins the Eurovision Song Contest.

Read full topic

item.title: Joke competition
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

There was a nerd in a ship, but suddenly it shipwrecks. Nerd is the only one who survived it because he managed to swam to nearby island.
After 1 year the nerd was still at the island, but one day he saw someone coming to beach with somekind of small boat. Nerd jumped up and started to wave his hands and calling help, and the boat came to shore.
Soon the nerd noticed how the boat was made from some tree trunks, very poorly done. Woman who came with boat asked:"Hi, were you in the shipwreck about 1 year ago?
He answered:“Yea… I thought I was the only survivor.”
Woman soon noticed how poorly the nerd was living at the island, he didn’t even have any shelter so she asked him to come with her, to her place.

Soon they row to woman’s beach and nerd noticed how the woman had even made a little path with stones. Nerd said:“I have been sleeping without any shelter for about year and you have build even a little path with rock???!”
Woman answered:“Well… 1 year is a long time you know.”

Woman had build a very large and fancy treehouse, nerd was amazed and couldn’t say a thing. Soon they went inside it.
Woman said:“I noticed how long your beard is, want to shave it?”
“But how?” asked nerd.
“I have made a little shaver, it’s in the bathroom.”
She even had bathroom and everything, even shower!
Soon nerd shaved his beard and came out of bathroom. Woman asked if he would like to have some drink, but nerd got angry and yelled:“No more coconut milk! I have had enough of it!”
Woman answered:“Woah… Hold on, I got something better here. I have learned how to make distrill alcohol drink from it. Wanna have some?”

When they were drinking the coconut booze, woman started to get closer and closer to nerd, and said she will go to shower.

Nerd was still amazed, he had been sleeping under palms for about year but this woman has made huge house, bathroom, shower and even booze!

Woman came out of shower, almost half naked and said:“Look I even made a little bed in here…” nerd just answered “Cool”.
Woman continued:“You know… I think we both miss one thing from normal life, that men and women usually do…”
Nerd jumped up and was really excited and asked with loud voice:“WHAT?? CAN I READ MY EMAIL???”

Took some time to write it I’m sure there are many grammar mistakes, I translated it from Finland so don’t get angry.

Read full topic
